name: Ori and the Blind Forest: Definitive Edition

files.goginstall: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Ori and The Blind Forest - Definitive Edition/oriDE.exe

content:
files:
- goginstall: N/A:Select the Windows setup file downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Ori and The Blind Forest - Definitive Edition/oriDE.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running Setup
    executable: goginstall
    name: wineexec
